com.piggybox.bags
Class NthTupleFromBag

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.pig.EvalFunc<T>
      com.piggybox.utils.SimpleEvalFunc<org.apache.pig.data.Tuple>
          com.piggybox.bags.NthTupleFromBag

public class NthTupleFromBag
extends SimpleEvalFunc<org.apache.pig.data.Tuple>

Returns the Nth (indexing from zero) tuple from a bag. Requires a second parameter that will be returned if the bag is empty. This is a general routine of datafu.pig.bags.FristTupleFromBag in datafu package. Example: 

  define NthTupleFromBag com.piggybox.bags.NthTupleFromBag();
 
  -- input:
  -- ({(a,1), (b,2)})
  input = LOAD 'input' AS (B: bag {T: tuple(alpha:CHARARRAY, numeric:INT)});
 
  output = FOREACH input GENERATE NthTupleFromBag(1, B, null);
 
  -- output:
  -- (b,2)
